name: pbenson.gitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub 
This is a collection of my shared work. The current focus is on my work with students in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program at the University of Michigan.

### Boot camp
In the QFRM boot camp, you will develop your web presence with your umich page, your GitHub user page linked to GitHub projects, and Jupyter notebooks that demonstrate your Python skills as they relate to finance.

Bootcamp requires that you have [Atom](https://atom.io), [Anaconda](https://www.continuum.io/downloads), and [GitHub Desktop](https://desktop.github.com) installed.

See the Boot Camp project here.

### p5
